title: 17 Things Men Love to Hear The Most in a Relationship

steps.title: Expressing your love for him never stops being crucial.
steps.content: Expressing your love for him never stops being crucial. Though you can start with “I love you,” you can find different ways of saying, “I love you” that feel more personal to him. Mentioning specific situations that show why you adore him so much can help keep a man in love with you for a long time. “I love how you take time to really focus on me when I’m stressed.” “I love you to the moon and back.” “I’m happy to be here with you right now.” “You really matter to me.” [1] X Research source

steps.title: Convey how thrilled you are with who he is.
steps.content: Convey how thrilled you are with who he is. Your positive affirmations let him know it’s ok not to be perfect, while they focus on the best things about him. He’s human like everyone else, and the fact that you choose to love him can make all the difference in the world. “I love everything about you.” [2] X Research source “I see you completely, and love everything I see.” “Know that I appreciate you always.” [3] X Research source “You make me feel safe.”

steps.title: Calling a guy handsome makes him feel great about himself.
steps.content: Calling a guy handsome makes him feel great about himself. It not only makes a guy feel special , but is also a serious boost to his confidence. Your compliment can improve his mood and can certainly bring the two of you closer together. [4] X Research source Compliment his manhood by stating how great he looks every day, from the moment he wakes up to the time he goes to bed. “Even when you first wake up, you look so great.” “I know you said you were working out, but wow! Look at you.” “You’re extra gorgeous when you laugh.” “You look so manly today…I love it.” [5] X Research source Dating coach John Keegan notes other helpful compliments, like “You have great style,” “You’re really eloquent when you talk,” or “You have great ideas.”

steps.title: Show how much he meets your desires in the bedroom.
steps.content: Show how much he meets your desires in the bedroom. Be genuine when speaking about everything from sexual satisfaction to the emotional intimacy he shares. Don’t forget to mention the little ways he makes you happy when you compliment him in bed; those compliments will keep him going strong. “I love being wrapped up in your sexy arms.” “I adore how gentle you are with me.” “You make me weak in the knees every time.” “No one has ever turned me on like you do.” [6] X Research source

steps.title: Showing respect for a man is another way to show appreciation.
steps.content: Showing respect for a man is another way to show appreciation. Let him know that he’s on the right track in life and that you see how much he cares about what’s important. Make a list of what impresses you about him the most and don’t be shy when reminding him about it. “You’re doing the right thing.” “You can accomplish whatever you put your mind to.” [7] X Research source “You’re a good man.” “You’re an even better version of yourself every time I see you.” [8] X Research source

steps.title: Mention how you notice and recognize everything he does.
steps.content: Mention how you notice and recognize everything he does. It’s one thing to say “thank you” every time he does something nice for you, but showing how much his efforts mean to you says a lot. Use details when you talk about the little things he does, from doing errands to being supportive. “Thank you for driving out of your way to pick up dinner tonight.” “Thank you for raking the leaves when you got off work early.” [9] X Research source “How do you do it all?” [10] X Research source “There’s nothing you can’t fix, is there?”

steps.title: Let your guy know how happy he makes you every day.
steps.content: Let your guy know how happy he makes you every day. If you want to impress the man you’re with, you can speak up to tell him everything he’s doing right. Remind him how much you miss him when you’re not together, or share that the one thing you need in life is him. Reference a specific situation when he listened to your problems or was super thoughtful when you needed it. “I miss you every single day we’re apart.” “You are the best husband anyone could ask for.” [11] X Research source “Thank you for listening to me vent; You’re the best listener I’ve ever known.” “Thank you for being so thoughtful. I truly appreciate it.” [12] X Research source

steps.title: They want to know that you believe in them.
steps.content: They want to know that you believe in them. When it comes to what men want in a woman , they need a support system in their life. In addition to their good friends and family, they depend on their romantic partner’s support. When it comes to their struggles, challenges, goals, or dreams, they need you in their corner cheering them on every step of the way. [13] X Research source “It’s no surprise that people want to work with you. They trust you and your abilities, as they should. You’re amazing at what you do!” “Of course you got the job. You’re talented and hard-working—everyone knows it, especially me.” “Look at how much you’ve accomplished in your life already. You’re going to achieve many amazing things because you don’t waste a single opportunity that comes your way.” "You've never steered us wrong in the past, and the future looks bright." [14] X Research source

steps.title: Let him know you’re by his side no matter what.
steps.content: Let him know you’re by his side no matter what. Whatever he’s going through, show him how impressed you are by his efforts in how he goes about things. Have confidence in his ability to solve any problems he faces and come out the other side victorious. “You are so talented and I know you’ll succeed.” “We’re gonna be ok, thanks to you.” “You’ve got this.” "I know you’ll make the right decision.”

steps.title: They want to know that you appreciate who they are.
steps.content: They want to know that you appreciate who they are. Demonstrate that you respect them personally, especially in connection with what separates them from others. When you accept the unique aspects of the man you’re with, it lets them know that you’re not trying to change who they are. They can try to be the best version of themself with someone like you by their side. “You’re such a gentleman.” “You’re so incredibly caring to me.” “You’re confident enough to know what’s best.” "I respect your character.” [15] X Research source

steps.title: Demonstrate your interest in his opinion.
steps.content: Demonstrate your interest in his opinion. Whether he’s trying to handle a particular issue or just believes strongly about something, he’ll know you respect what he thinks. Asking him what he thinks also shows that you need him, which helps men feel worthy of being in a relationship. “You always come up with the best solutions.” “I know you can help me through this.” “I trust your intuition about what’s right.” "Make me feel better about decisions like you always do.”

steps.title: They want to know they can make you happy.
steps.content: They want to know they can make you happy. It’s important to many men to know that you need them in your life. When you tell a man how much he makes a difference to you, you’re letting him know how much you value him. He’ll feel stronger in who he is as a man when he knows you feel this way within your relationship. “My life is so much better with you in it.” “Thank you for sacrificing so much for me.” “You always look out for me and make sure I’ll be ok.” "I’m so blessed to have a man like you in my life.” [16] X Research source

steps.title: Stand by him in both good times and bad.
steps.content: Stand by him in both good times and bad. Don’t leave him to struggle with problems he may face or keep your issues to yourself. Let him know you depend on him to help you get what you want. Be confident about all the great things you can obtain when working together as a team. “We are a dynamic duo for a reason.” “You and I are in this as a team.” “We stand united and will succeed!” "We’re stronger together.”

steps.title: Admit when you know you’re wrong.
steps.content: Admit when you know you’re wrong. Being stubborn can hurt a man’s feelings, especially when you do so on purpose. By apologizing for your wrongdoing, you let him know that you’re both equally important in your relationship no matter what. “You were absolutely right about that.” “I apologize for my reactions.” “I very much regret what I said.” "Please forgive me.”

steps.title: Make sure he’s aware of how much confidence you have in him.
steps.content: Make sure he’s aware of how much confidence you have in him. It matters to him what you think about his wants, desires, and goals. If you have faith in him, telling him you trust his ability to lead is one of those things guys love but won’t admit that’s worth doing. “I have the utmost faith in you.” “My confidence belongs to you.” “You’re the one I’ll rely on.” "I’m always banking on you.”

steps.title: Offer him the freedom to celebrate good times with his good friends.
steps.content: Offer him the freedom to celebrate good times with his good friends. When he knows you support any activities that make him happy, he’ll know you truly love him. Show excitement when he heads out to be with friends so he’ll look forward to coming home to you. “Make a memorable night with your crew.” “It’s party time for you and the boys.” “Live it up with your pals.” "Have a good hang out session with your buddies.”

steps.title: Men want to know that you find them sexually attractive.
steps.content: Men want to know that you find them sexually attractive. Feeling confident about yourself is an important part of being in a romantic relationship. When a man’s partner tells them how good-looking, strong, or charismatic they are, it can boost confidence. Men will not only feel good about themselves but also know they’re appreciated by you, as well. [17] X Research source “You’re so hot.” “You drive me wild.” “You are one smokin’ dude.” "I find you so attractive.”
